Tools

类 MathTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tools.MathTools

  • public class MathTools
extends java.lang.Object
    MathTools class contains complex mathematical calculations used in the code.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getDistance

        public static float getDistance(float x1,
                                float y1,
                                float x2,
                                float y2)
        Calculates the distance between two points.
        参数:
        x1 - The x-coordinate of the first point
        y1 - The y-coordinate of the first point
        x2 - The x-coordinate of the second point
        y2 - The y-coordinate of the second point
        返回:
        The distance between the two points

      • Linear

        public static float Linear(float x,
                           float w,
                           float b)
        Computes the value of a linear equation y = wx + b.
        参数:
        x - The input value
        w - The coefficient of x
        b - The constant term
        返回:
        The value of y for the given x

      • calculateSMA

        public static float[] calculateSMA(float[] data,
                                   int windowSize)
        Computes the Simple Moving Average (SMA) of a data array. Uses 0 to fill in, ensuring the length of the returned array remains unchanged.
        参数:
        data - The data array to compute the moving average
        windowSize - The size of the moving average window
        返回:
        An array containing the moving averages
